Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Miami Beach (South Beach), The Sanctuary South Beach is minutes from New World Symphony Park and The Fillmore Miami. This 4-star condo is within close proximity of New World Symphony Campus and Miami Beach Convention Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 27 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. 42-inch LCD televisions are provided, with digital programming available. Conveniences include safes and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and a hair salon.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the condo's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the condo's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Miami Beach (South Beach), The Sanctuary South Beach is minutes from New World Symphony Park and The Fillmore Miami. This 4-star condo is within close proximity of New World Symphony Campus and Miami Beach Convention Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

New World Symphony Park - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
The Fillmore Miami - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
New World Symphony Campus - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Miami Beach Convention Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

Anchor Shops - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Bass Museum of Art - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

Holocaust Memorial - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Lincoln Road Mall - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Colony Theater - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Bayshore Municipal Golf Course - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Miami Beach Cinematheque - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Miami Beach Golf Club - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for The Sanctuary South Beach is Miami, FL (MIA-Miami Intl.) - 14.8 km / 9.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
